title: Calories in Shredded Chicken
meta_description: Discover calories in shredded chicken per 100 g, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Cooked, skinless chicken breast, shredded; no added oil, seasonings, or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut (breast vs. thigh), cooking method, added ingredients, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of shredded chicken provides ~165 kcal and ~31 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp BBQ sauce per 100 g
Use chicken thigh instead of breast per 100 g
Saut√© with 1 tsp oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 g shredded chicken?
faqs.a: About 165 kcal for plain cooked, skinless breast.

faqs.q: Is shredded chicken high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~31 g protein per 100 g, making it great for muscle building.
No carbs in plain shredded chicken breast; it's mostly protein and fat.

faqs.q: How does cooking method affect calories in shredded chicken?
faqs.a: Boiled or grilled is lower calorie; frying or adding oil increases it by 40+ kcal per tsp.

faqs.q: What about sodium in shredded chicken?
faqs.a: ~74 mg per 100 g plain; rises with seasonings, broth, or store-bought versions.
